description.value: The arcanist can unleash a blast of force by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. This attack automatically strikes one target within 30 feet (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{Magic Missile}) and deals 1d4 points of force damage, plus 1 point of damage per arcanist level. Spells and effects that negate @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{Magic Missile} also negate this effect.
